##Spiritual Pact

* Passive: Become immune to Debuffs and Disables but in addition can't be affected by any kind of Buffs from abilities, items, summoner spells and ally abilities.

replies.body: take that on kata and you'll have absolutely 0 ways to counterplay her, pretty  broken if you ask me
You could, but she wouldn't benefit from her passive since it counts as a self-buff.

No it shouldn't...

Unless you want to recode every beneficial ability to count as a buff for the sake of this rune.
This isn't a Rune that Kata should be even considered to take in the first place since it's in the Resolve tree.
Nonetheless it should be clear what counts as buff and debuff and is affected by this rune.
It doesn't matter what is 'considered,' people will take whatever they feel works best for both their playstyle as well as their Champion.
what champs are supposed to NOT take this keystone?
You definitely don't want to take that on Taric because it would remove the most powerful passive in the game from him making him pretty useless.
Maybe activate upon impairing the movement of an enemy? And have a duration of 3 seconds? Cooldown 12 seconds?
by the way, knock back and knock up still works right? It's not a Debuffs or Disables in my consideration.
That. Is WAY too much. Neat design, but it should have a cooldown or something or act as an active like Edge of Night.
It could be better in terms of balancing but it would have to have a longer duration than Edge of Night considering it would be an active based rune like Predator.
what counts as a debuff? CC?
